text: The Essex Rebels are a basketball club from Colchester, Essex. The Rebels' women's team compete in the Women's British Basketball League (WBBL), the top- level women's basketball league in Great Britain. After competing in the Women's National Basketball League as the Essex Blades, the Rebels started life in the professional ranks of the WBBL at the start of the 2018-19 season. ==Women's team== 2016 Cup Final Winners The Rebels are coached by Tom Sadler, who has been coaching the team since November 2018 and is now in a permanent position of Head of Basketball Performance for the University. ===Players=== ===Season-by-season records=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%;" |-bgcolor="#efefef" !rowspan="2"|Season !rowspan="2"|Division !rowspan="2"|Tier !colspan="6"|Regular Season !rowspan="2"|Post-Season !rowspan="2"|Trophy !rowspan="2"|Cup !rowspan="2"|Head Coach |- !
